interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest in the world.
Australia is the only country that is also a continent.
India is the world's largest democracy.
Germany is home to the world's largest beer festival, Oktoberfest.
Egypt is home to the Great Pyramid of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
France is the most visited country in the world.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Cape Town, and Bloemfontein.
